ygData.subject: Re: Odd doings in Halas
ygData.msgSnippet: Vengeful Composer keeps attacking me on my way to Halas,  annoying little guy  does very little damage to me though ... From: Sean Kennedy  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Vengeful Composer keeps attacking me on my way to Halas, annoying little
guy does very little damage to me though
----- Original Message -----
From: Sean Kennedy <orang@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 6:19 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Odd doings in Halas


From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>

In Halas today I overheard a 15th level
shaman having a conversation with a
female human npc (Thadres something
or other) She mentioned that her brother
had mysteriously attacked a group of
bards, and been slain. Then spouted
something incoherent about the questioner
crossing her or some such, and proceeded
to make VERY short work of him/her.

Then, out in Everfrost, there are 2 new kinds
of skeletons (red to the 3rd level shaman
I was goofing off with) called a Vengeful
Lyricist and a Vengeful Soloist.

Methinks tis time to get my bard cross the
continent to check things out. I am only
1 level higher than the shaman who bought
it though, so it could be a dangerous thing.

Tindayen
